notes: For refrigerated fish, bake at 400F for 25-30 minutes for large fillets (>1 inch tall) and 15-20 for thin ones
recipe: While still frozen, place in a tin foil covered pan. Cover with olive oil and bake for 4 minutes
Remove from the oven and cover with salt, pepper, and lemon juice
Return to the oven for 8-12 minutes based on thickness
